Class javachart.chart.Speedo 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Speedo
public class Speedo
extends Object
A gauge style charting component that displays a single data value

Speedo(Dataset[], SpeedoAxis, Plotarea)
Constructs a Speedo chart from the specified array of Dataset classes, SpeedoAxis and Plotarea.

doNeedle(Graphics)
Draws current needle style on the specified Graphics.
doSweepRegion(Graphics, int)
draw(Graphics)
Draws this as currently defined on the specified Graphics
getAlarmThreshold()
Inquires the current alarm threshold
getNeedleStyle()
Inquires the current needle style
setAlarmThreshold(double)
Sets the current alarm threshold (not implemented)
setNeedleStyle(int)
Sets the current needle style.

Speedo 
  public Speedo(Dataset d[],
                SpeedoAxis ax,
                Plotarea subplot)
Constructs a Speedo chart from the specified array of Dataset classes, SpeedoAxis and Plotarea. Note: This chart plots only the Y value from the first Datum in the first Dataset
Parameters:
d - Array of Datasets to consider
ax - SpeedoAxis scaling this data
subplot - Plotarea containing this gauge
See Also:
SpeedoAxis

draw 
  public synchronized void draw(Graphics g)
Draws this as currently defined on the specified Graphics
Parameters:
g - Graphics class to draw
getAlarmThreshold 
  public double getAlarmThreshold()
Inquires the current alarm threshold
Returns:
current threshold
setAlarmThreshold 
  public void setAlarmThreshold(double num)
Sets the current alarm threshold (not implemented)
Parameters:
num - threshold
getNeedleStyle 
  public int getNeedleStyle()
Inquires the current needle style
Returns:
current needle style
setNeedleStyle 
  public void setNeedleStyle(int num)
Sets the current needle style. This is one of: 0 - a simple line with a small arrowhead, 1 - single line needle, 2 - polygonal "fat" needle, 3 - sweep arc.
Parameters:
num - needle style
doNeedle 
  protected void doNeedle(Graphics g)
Draws current needle style on the specified Graphics.
Parameters:
g - Graphics to draw
doSweepRegion 
  protected void doSweepRegion(Graphics g,
                               int endDegrees)
